info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:34PM EDT until July 27 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Northern Middlesex County in southern Connecticut... Northwestern New Haven County in southern Connecticut... Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 534 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dover Plains to near Wingdale to near Fahnestock State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lake Carmel and Sherman around 540 PM EDT. Brewster and New Fairfield around 545 PM EDT. Danbury and Brookfield around 550 PM EDT. Southbury and Newtown around 555 PM EDT. Middlebury around 600 PM EDT. Waterbury and Wolcott around 605 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
